title: Why Runaan?
body:
Can someone explain to me why Runaan is build on every ADC? I feel like I'm just not getting the value out of it. I feel like if I just build as much damage as possible I'd be better off. Note I've only been playing for 4 days though since I took a year break. So can someone tell me how I should be playing with this item or is it situational? 

Also, another question, the last Caitlyn game I had I was trying to carry my team but didn't feel like I had the damage to threaten the fed Darius enough. Their team had a lot of tanks too. I was also kinda the only damage on the team as every lane got shat on. 
https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=vSekai what would be the ideal build for hypercarrying on ADC?

replies.body:
I removed him, happy now?
It was just for the sake of this list and some play him as Marksmen when playing breaking the meta stuff

I'm sorry that's my inner coach
xD

Runaan's on Caitlyn is actually really good because she can stack her passive for more headshots. Some champions like it for this reason, since it helps them use on hit passives or abilities. some champions on-hit effects do not benefit from it though, such as Vayne's W, and Xayah's feathers.

Runaan's is used often with on-hit items because it gives you more gold efficiency out of both it and the on-hit items. Hitting 3 targets and applying the effect is very good. Stuff like Black cleaver, Blade of the Ruined King, stattik shiv stacking, and wit's end all benefit from it and make the item stronger by synergy.

Blade of the Ruined King plus armor pen is what it takes to deal with a fed juggernaut. Sometimes a frozen mallet can be helpful too. If you're struggling against multiple tanks then adding in a Runaan's allows you to apply the on hit effects of Blade of the ruined king to multiple targets.

Runnan is good for champs that has either built in special auto interactions like Jinx and Kindred or champs who build on hit items like BotRK

Honestly in this meta, there is no reason to not get BotRK and since Runnan auto's 2 other targets, it becomes a must have. Even on Jhin and Graves contrary to popular belief. 

Runnan is currently the best "zeal" item in the game for nonmelee champs. It gives you waveclear and better teamfight capabilities.
